law.catch_line: Definitions and chapter provisions applicable to KRS Chapters 39B to 39F.
law.text: The definitions and other provisions of this chapter shall apply to this chapter and to KRS Chapters 39B, 39C, 39D, 39E, and 39F unless the language or context of a particular statute requires otherwise.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 226, sec. 28, effective July 15, 1998.
